rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {GRN1040, GRN1060, GRN1080, GRN1100, GRN1125}

description: This unit is for students with little or no knowledge of the language. This unit consists of two components. Component 1: Language. A communicatively oriented German language course designed for all-round development in the language. Component 2: This component will familiarise students with the history, culture and the socio-economic conditions of the German-speaking countries.
